text: Jwawechete ajula juwakwete umanyilisi wa m’chitabu kuti: “Une chinam’bichilile nacho nkaniliusyaausye kukwenu liso lyenu.” Basi ndema jajwachiweni (Sulaimana chindanda cha uchimwene chila) chili chitamilichiche kukwakwe jwatite: “Ayi ili mu ukoto wa Ambuje wangu kuti aninje yanti; ana tindogolele kapena tingane! Sano jwatatogolele nikuti akutogolela kwaalikamuchisya nsyene, nambo soni jwatakane basi (akukana kwaalikonya nsyene), chisimu Ambuje wangu ni Wakupata kwejinji (wangalajila chilichose), Wantuuka wannope.”
